title.narrative: UNHCR Humanitarian Contribution to the Ukraine Crisis through Moldova

description.narrative: This allocation contributes to meeting the objectives under the Regional Refugee Response Plan concerning the crisis in Ukraine. The contribution is given to the Ukraine Crisis through Moldova.

This allocation of 25 million DKK to UNHCR activities in Moldova contributes to meeting the objectives of the inter-agency refugee Response Plan, and more specifically to UNHCR’s activities focusing on protection, shelter and cash assistance for refugees in Moldova.
This allocation contributes to meeting the objectives of the inter-agency regional refugee response plan, and more specifically will support UNHCRs work on on protection, shelter and cash assistance for refugees in Moldova.
Due to its nature as a response to a humanitarian appeal operational results are general and highly aggregated and the MFA contribution is thus reflected in the overall results reporting by the partner. Please refer to the hyperlink below.
https://www.unhcr.org/data.html
